naslov: Sukošan, beautiful terraced house near the sea, 81 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: A modern terraced house for sale in the immediate vicinity of the sea, just a few minutes’ drive from Zadar! This beautiful terraced house is spread over three floors, elegantly connected by an internal staircase. The ground floor contains a spacious kitchen connected to the living room and a modern bathroom. On the first floor there are two comfortable bedrooms with an additional bathroom. The second floor provides space for entertainment and relaxation, with a large room equipped with billiards, darts and smart TV. For complete comfort, the house is equipped with an air conditioner that ensures a comfortable temperature during warm summer days. On the second floor there is also a spacious terrace with an outdoor jacuzzi for four people. For added outdoor enjoyment, there is a private walled garden with comfortable seating. In addition, the large shared garden offers space for preparing delicious meals on the shared grill. The location of the house is also outstanding – the beach is only a few steps away, and the beautiful city of Zadar is easily accessible by car, giving you the opportunity to explore its rich history and culture whenever you want. This house offers everything you need for a comfortable life in a Mediterranean environment. For additional information, contact us!
